Html:
Hi, I have create an Update with the au.msi file, but when I publish the page I receive an error "createDirectory failed"

Thanks, Michael
Is it the first time you publish a package or have you already successfully publish one ?
Can you try again. When you have the error message, go to 'Help'->'Send debug info', then click on the link at bottom left. And send me the file to package.publisher@free.fr
